title: Underwater Cave Carver Feature
description:
'minecraft:underwater_cave_carver_feature' carves a cave through the world in the current chunk, and in every chunk around the current chunk in an 8 radial pattern.This feature will specifically target creating caves only below sea level.
This feature will also only work when placed specifically in the pass `pregeneration_pass`.

fill_with.title: Fill With
fill_with.description: Reference to the block to fill the cave with.

width_modifier.title: Width Modifier
width_modifier.description: How many blocks to increase the cave radius by, from the center point of the cave.

skip_carve_chance.title: Skip Carve Chance
skip_carve_chance.description: The chance to skip doing the carve (1 / value).

height_limit.title: Height Limit
height_limit.description: The height limit where we attempt to carve

replace_air_with.title: Replace Air With
replace_air_with.description: Reference to the block to replace air blocks with.
